title: Soil pH Management
description: Most crops prefer pH 6.0-7.0. Test soil regularly. Add lime to raise pH, sulfur to lower it. Organic matter helps buffer pH.

title: Organic Matter Improvement
description: Add compost, manure, or crop residues to improve soil structure, water retention, and nutrient availability. Aim for 3-5% organic matter.

title: Soil Erosion Prevention
description: Use contour farming, terracing, cover crops, and mulching to prevent soil erosion, especially on slopes.
